mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (post_type, board_no, mem_no, post_title, post_content, post_category, post_start_day, post_end_day, post_plan) VALUES( #{post_type:INTEGER}, #{board_no:INTEGER}, #{mem_no:INTEGER}, #{post_title:VARCHAR}, #{post_content:VARCHAR}, #{post_category:VARCHAR}, #{post_start_day:VARCHAR}, #{post_end_day:VARCHAR}, #{post_plan:VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET post_type=#{post_type:INTEGER}, board_no=#{board_no:INTEGER}, mem_no=#{mem_no:INTEGER}, post_title=#{post_title:VARCHAR}, post_content= #{post_content:VARCHAR}, post_category=#{post_category:VARCHAR}, post_regtime=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), post_start_day=#{post_start_day:VARCHAR}, post_end_day=#{post_end_day:VARCHAR}, post_plan=#{post_plan:VARCHAR} where post_no=#{post_no}
UPDATE post SET post_hits = post_hits + 1 WHERE post_no=#{post_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post WHERE post_no = #{post_no:INTEGER} AND post_del_check=false

select p.* , m.mem_id as cmt_person, c.cmt_no, c.mem_no, cmt_title, cmt_content from comment c right join (select post_no, post_title, mem_id, post_content, post_category , date_format(post_regtime, '%y-%m-%d') as post_regtime , post_hits, ((post_end_day)-(post_start_day)) as days from post, members where post_no = #{post_no:INTEGER} and post.mem_no = members.mem_no) p on p.post_no = c.post_no left join members m on c.mem_no = m.mem_no;
